valueString.value: Opioid medication formulations (ingredient, OR ingredient+strength+form : RXNORM TTY=IN or SCD OR SBD) that are abuseable in ambulatory setting and have extended release dose form.
Formulations with dose form Topical Cream(RXCUI 316982) or Topical Solution(RXCUI 316986). Ingredients available in surgery.

valueMarkdown.value: Note that the terminologies included in this implementation guide will need to be updated, because the ideal mechanism for distribution (as an expression) is not currently supported by the content logical definition constructs available in the FHIR ValueSet resource and all known implementations of it. Before use in a production environment, ensure you have the latest value sets based on the definitions for each value set (as defined in the inclusion/exclusion criteria for each one).

title.value: RxNorm Extended Release Opioid Medications with Ambulatory Abuse Potential

publisher.value: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC)

description.value: ValueSet containing all opioid clinical drugs that are not restricted to surgical use only, and that are in an extended release dose form codes.

display.value: Clinical Focus

text.value: All opioid clinical drugs that are not restricted to surgical use only, and that are in an extended release dose form.

display.value: United States of America

purpose.value: Used to determine if prescription is for extended release opioids for recommendation 4.
